title: Senior Learner-Tailored Anatomy Education Program: Utilizing System-Based Lecture Notes and Interactive Learning Objects

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of basic physiology and medical terminology
context.additional_context: Integrates VR content and mobile-friendly interactive learning objects within smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify core structures of the peripheral nervous system with 85% accuracy and explain their functional associations.
Learners apply anatomical problem-solving strategies for real clinical scenarios at least three times through interactive patient case simulations (IPCS).
Learners memorize and reproduce 50 anatomical terms with 90% accuracy using weekly quizzes and flashcards.

resources: Mobile-Optimized Lecture Notes (PDF) Based on a System
Interactive Patient Case Simulation (IPCS) Mobile App
Diagnostic Game and Flashcard Web Application
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
